mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT * FROM students_courses WHERE (course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%') OR #{courseName} IS NULL) AND (course_start_at >= #{startDate} OR #{startDate} IS NULL) AND (course_end_at <= #{endDate} OR #{endDate} IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(name, kana_name, nickname, mail_address, address, age, gender, remark, isDeleted) VALUES(#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{mailAddress}, #{address}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses(student_id, course_name, course_start_at, course_end_at) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartAt}, #{courseEndAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kana_name = #{kanaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, mail_address = #{mailAddress}, address = #{address}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, isDeleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
